S

setAutorun(boolean) - Method in class com.alma.platform.data.PluginDescriptor
Set the mode of the plugin, that is, if the plugin has to be institated by the platform or an application
setClassName(String) - Method in class com.alma.platform.data.PluginDescriptor
Set the main class name of the plugin, ie: the class which has to be instantiated by the application (or the platform if the plugin is in autorun mode).
setDirectoryPath(String) - Method in class com.alma.platform.data.PluginDescriptor
Set the path of the plugin project and more precisely, the path of the compiled source (.class).
setInstance(Object) - Method in class com.alma.platform.data.PluginInstance
 
setInterfaceName(String) - Method in class com.alma.platform.data.PluginDescriptor
Set the name of the interface which have to be implemented by the plugin.
setName(String) - Method in class com.alma.platform.data.PluginInstance
 
setPluginName(String) - Method in class com.alma.platform.data.PluginDescriptor
Set the name of the plugin.
setType(int) - Method in class com.alma.platform.data.PluginInstance
 
suite() - Static method in class com.alma.platform.AppTest
